entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS, MAINLY THIS EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS AROUND 80
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
